data.title: Allied Cloud
data.meta_description: Our team of experts is ready to work with yours Dedicated To Helping Your Company Grow. At Allied Cloud, our vision is to deliver software solutions to our  ...
data.text:
Jeff founded Allied Cloud in 2013 to help small to medium-sized businesses scale on the NetSuite platform. He is a technology industry veteran with more than 25 years experience in engineering, management and leadership. Prior to founding Allied Cloud, Jeff was an Engineering manager for SAIC, and co-founder and Executive Director of the San Diego Futures Foundation.

Savannah manages the sales process with NetSuite and prospective clients for both the NetSuite Social Impact and Business teams. This includes interfacing with NetSuite, coordinating meetings, collecting information, participating in sales and scoping calls to document requirements. She also oversees the Support team, and reengages with clients to ensure the highest level of service as they continue using NetSuite. Savannah has a Bachelor’s of Science in Mathematics Economics, and a certificate in Data Analytics from Western Kentucky University, and is based in Kentucky.

Griffin assists with the overall management of projects as an Implementation Project Manager. He helps assemble the implementation team schedules and leads team calls, helps manage the client’s implementation budget, and leads conversations with clients related to the status of the implementation. Residing in Maryland, Griffin earned both a B.S. in Information Systems, as well as his MBA from Salisbury University.

Renee leads NetSuite Implementations for our clients. She has a bachelor’s degree in Accounting from Southeastern Louisiana University. She has experience in for-profit and social enterprise manufacturing and distribution, managing government contracts and grants for services, and donor stewardship. She enjoys supporting process improvement and streamlining with technology and innovation. On weekends, she creates stained glass and spends time with her family and 2 Goldendoodles outside of New Orleans, Louisiana.

Travis is a NetSuite Certified Administrator, Consultant and Developer with more than 8 years’ experience working within the NetSuite platform. He manages all advanced customizations, third-party integrations, services, and the development of our NetSuite product portfolio, including our Real Estate solution. Travis is the first NetSuite engineer to pass the NetSuite ERP, SuiteCloud, and Administrator certifications, and is based in Pennsylvania

Terry provides a deep background in financial management and configuration of NetSuite for advanced financials and reporting. He has six years of experience with NetSuite for both General Business and Social Impact, with an emphasis on International implementations, particularly Canada. Terry is based in Michigan.

Leah provides implementation support as a Business Analyst. She attends implementation calls, assists with the coordination, and follow-up implementation tasks, configures NetSuite accounts, and assists with data migration. She has 5 years of experience as a NetSuite Functional Consultant for clients in the manufacturing and W&D industries. Leah holds NetSuite SuiteFoundation, Financial User, and ERP certifications.

Joel is an implementation lead with expertise in the non profit side of NetSuite. He is from Bulacan, Philippines and went to school at Pamantasan ng Lungsod ng Maynila. He worked for a Washington-based social marketing non-profit for more than 15 years and worked at Oracle NetSuite for 5 years as a functional consultant / solution principal in the GB / non-profit vertical. Joel has the ERP Consultant, Administrator, Financial/Suite Analytics User, and SuiteFoundation Certifications. In his free time he likes to be with his toy poodles and go hiking.

Based in Connecticut, Roz has ten years of experience as a NetSuite Administrator, and has implemented NetSuite for more than 100 companies. With roles ranging from project manager to CFO, she has also worked for nonprofits and non-government organizations around the world on everything from revamping cash-based accounting systems to quadrupling warehouse operations.

Bernadette manages the day-to-day operations for support services and administers over our ticketing and project management system. Additionally, she supports the Directors with creating and evolving vital business processes and performing various administrative functions. Bernadette received a Bachelor of Arts degree in English from the University of California, Davis, and acquired her skills working in the non-profit, government, education, and healthcare sectors. Based in Arizona, she enjoys spending quality time with her family and rediscovering her love for astronomy.

Scott provides an extensive array of technical services, and develops a range of custom solutions for our customers. Scott focuses on tailoring NetSuite specifically for our client’s needs, primarily in the areas of workflows, ecommerce, custom forms and automations.

Fran oversees the data migrations for go-live data such as open transactions and Trial Balances, as well as assists in the preparation of data mapping and configuring NetSuite accounts for data imports. Fran also works as Account Manager for Support Clients, serving as their first point of contact, helping clients resolve technical issues, and acting as a liaison between the client and other Allied Cloud resources as needed. In addition, she conducts training for both for-profit and non-profit clients as well as assist with multi-lingual implementations and trainings. Fran is based in New York.

Chiara works as an Account Manager for Support Clients, serving as their first point of contact, helping clients resolve technical issues, and acting as a liaison between the client and other Allied Cloud resources as needed. She also works with implementation clients as a specialized technical resource as needed. Chiara is based in the Philippines.

Liza provides implementation and client support as a NetSuite Consultant. She works with implementation clients as a specialized technical resource. She also serves as an Account Manager for Support Clients, serving as their first point of contact, helping clients resolve technical issues, and acting as a liaison between the client and other Allied Cloud resources as needed. She is an experienced consulting professional with a demonstrated history working in medical and computer software industry.She has 3 years of experience in Oracle NetSuite Cloud ERP as a Technical Support and Functional Consultant for General Business industry. Liza holds NetSuite Suite Foundation, Financial User and Administrator certifications and focusses primarily on general accounting, financials, budgets, bank transactions and fixed assets management. Liza is based in Philippines.
